about.title: About Me
paragraphs: I'm a full-stack developer who uses technology and AI not only to build, but to automate, solve, and accelerate the journey from customer needs to the final product.
My skills are strong in front-end, back-end, and relational database management.

Welcome.title: Full Stack Developer
Welcome.description: Specializing in creating seamless user experiences and powerful automations.

items.title: Static Websites
items.description: Fast, responsive, and SEO-optimized static websites built with modern technologies.

items.title: Web Applications
items.description: Full-stack web applications with robust backend integration and user authentication.

items.title: Customer Support Agent
items.description: Proficient in bilingual communication, providing exceptional customer service with tools like Zendesk.

items.title: I transform your workflow by integrating AI-powered solutions
items.description: We integrate AI tools like Zapier or n8n directly into your existing or custom-built software.
